org.mcavallo.opencloud.filters
Interface Filter<E>

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AcceptAllFilter, AcceptNoneFilter, AndFilter, DictionaryFilter, FilterBase, LengthFilter, MaxLengthFilter, MinLengthFilter, NonNullFilter, NotFilter, OrFilter, RegExFilter, TagFilter
public interface Filter<E>
extends java.io.Serializable

Interface that defines a generic object filter.

Method Summary
 boolean accept(E e)
          Tells whether the element is accepted or discarded by the filter.
 void filter(java.util.Collection<E> coll)
          Remove from the collection the objects non accepted by the filter
 

Method Detail

accept

boolean accept(E e)
Tells whether the element is accepted or discarded by the filter.

Parameters:
e - Object to consider
Returns:
True if the object is accepted by the filter, false if it is discarded

filter

void filter(java.util.Collection<E> coll)
Remove from the collection the objects non accepted by the filter

Parameters:
coll - Collection of objects to filter
